full_text: MATERIALS Our Super Easy Baby Blanket in Morning Bundle includes… 7 skeins of Purl Soho’s Morning ,75% organically grown cotton and 25% yak. Each skein is 191 yards; approximately 1,337 total yards required. A Purl Soho tote bag with the pattern printed on the back A postcard of the finished blanket You’ll also need… US 5 (3.75 mm), 24- or 32-inch circular needles Choose from three pretty color palettes… Beach Plum Color A: Heirloom White Color B: Sweet Apricot Color C: Pink Lemonade Color D: Pink Radish Color E: Purple Allium Color F: Mountain Purple Color G: Dungarees Blue Peninsula Color A: Araucana Blue Color B: Fresh Sky Color C: Tender Green Color D: Cucumber Ice Color E: Heirloom White Color F: Grassland Gray Color G: Stone Cottage Piazza Color A: Tender Green Color B: Cucumber Ice Color C: Sweet Apricot Color D: Yellow Apple Color E: Heirloom White Color F: Grassland Gray Color G: Stone Cottage GAUGE 20 stitches and 48 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch SIZE Finished Dimensions: Approximately 30 inches wide x 37 inches long
name: Ravelry: Super Easy Baby Blanket in Morning pattern by Purl Soho
